
Magichess
============
Magichess is an autonomous, internet connected smart chessboard that interfaces with the the [lichess API](https://lichess.org/api).

**Contributors:**
  * Weishan Li CompE '21
  * Sai Thuta Kyaw EE '21
  * Samantha Klein EE '21
  * Jack DeGuglielmo CompE '21

University of Massachusetts Amherst '21
Electrical and Computer Senior Design Project
Team 10
